languages.text: Вольному Торговцу необходимо сказать свое слово и вынести окончательное решение. Обратитесь к губернатору Драйвстему, когда будете готовы огласить приговор виновным.

traits.locale_text: Вольному Торговцу необходимо сказать свое слово и вынести окончательное решение. Обратитесь к губернатору Драйвстему, когда будете готовы огласить приговор виновным.

languages.text: The Rogue Trader must say {mf|his|her} piece and deliver the final judgement. Governor Drivestem must be notified when it is time to pronounce {mf|his|her} verdict on the accused.
languages.original_text: Вольному Торговцу необходимо сказать свое слово и вынести окончательное решение. Обратитесь к губернатору Драйвстему, когда будете готовы огласить приговор виновным.

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader must say {mf|his|her} word and deliver the final judgement. Governor Drivestem must be notified when it is time to announce the verdict to the guilty.
The Rogue Trader must say {mf|his|her} word and deliver the final judgement. Governor Drivestem must be notified when it is time to announce the verdict to the guilty.
The Rogue Trader must say {mf|his|her} piece and deliver the final judgement. Governor Drivestem must be notified when it is time to pronounce {mf|his|her} verdict on the accused.
The Rogue Trader must say {mf|his|her} piece and deliver the final judgement. Governor Drivestem must be notified when it is time to pronounce {mf|his|her} verdict on the accused.

languages.text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} muss das letzte Urteil sprechen. Wenn es so weit ist, muss Gouverneur Drivestem verständigt werden.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader must say {mf|his|her} piece and deliver the final judgement. Governor Drivestem must be notified when it is time to pronounce {mf|his|her} verdict on the accused.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} muss das letzte Urteil sprechen. Wenn es so weit ist, muss Gouverneur Drivestem verständigt werden.

languages.text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} doit parler et prononcer le jugement final. Le gouverneur Drivestem doit être averti quand l'heure sera venue pour {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} de rendre son verdict.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader must say {mf|his|her} piece and deliver the final judgement. Governor Drivestem must be notified when it is time to pronounce {mf|his|her} verdict on the accused.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} doit parler et prononcer le jugement final. Le gouverneur Drivestem doit être averti quand l'heure sera venue pour {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} de rendre son verdict.

languages.text: 自由開拓者は自分の意見を述べ、最後の判決を下さなければならない。被告人に評決を告げる時が来れば、ドライブステン総督にその旨を知らせなければならない。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader must say {mf|his|her} piece and deliver the final judgement. Governor Drivestem must be notified when it is time to pronounce {mf|his|her} verdict on the accused.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者は自分の意見を述べ、最後の判決を下さなければならない。被告人に評決を告げる時が来れば、ドライブステン総督にその旨を知らせなければならない。

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente debe pronunciarse y emitir el veredicto final. Será necesario informar al gobernador Drivestem cuando llegue el momento de dictar sentencia.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader must say {mf|his|her} piece and deliver the final judgement. Governor Drivestem must be notified when it is time to pronounce {mf|his|her} verdict on the accused.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente debe pronunciarse y emitir el veredicto final. Será necesario informar al gobernador Drivestem cuando llegue el momento de dictar sentencia.

languages.text: 行商浪人需要说出{mf|他|她}的意见，进行最后的判决。宣布最终判决时，德莱夫斯塔总督必须在场。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader must say {mf|his|her} piece and deliver the final judgement. Governor Drivestem must be notified when it is time to pronounce {mf|his|her} verdict on the accused.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人需要说出{mf|他|她}的意见，进行最后的判决。宣布最终判决时，德莱夫斯塔总督必须在场。

languages.text: Hür Tacir, kendi fikirlerini belirtip son kararı duyurmalı. Suçlunun kim olduğuna dair kararını açıklama vakti geldiğinde Vali Drivestem'e haber verilmeli.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader must say {mf|his|her} piece and deliver the final judgement. Governor Drivestem must be notified when it is time to pronounce {mf|his|her} verdict on the accused.
